website_summaries.verdict: These beads come in a soothing set of aquatic colors.
pros: Designed to expand to 1,000 times their dry size when placed in water
Expand nicely in cool colors, which can make a water table a fun experience for kids without the wet mess
The blues and greens are good for a lot of decorative purposes
Can be dehydrated and re-hydrated easily
cons: There are approximately 8,000 beads in this pack
Other kits have more for the money

customer_reviews.title: Great beads, but don't use so much water
customer_reviews.text: Great water beads but the directions call for too much water. They say to use 1 gallon (128oz) of water for each Tablespoon of beads. I knew this sounded like way too much, so I started with 64oz of water per Tablespoon and that was still too much. I dumped out quite a bit of water, so I probably only used 30-40oz. They're perfectly plump without being too mushy/wet, my 2yo daughter loves them! We haven't had any problems with them falling apart (other then when she purposely rips them apart). The colors are really pretty, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have an art studio for kids and used these in a messy play workshop. They plumped up quickly and were absolutely beautiful! The kids loved them and they stayed in great shape after many hands and little bodies sitting in them! Definitely recommend! I used two packets to fill a small pool and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: KellyP

customer_reviews.title: Delicate/breakable when full
customer_reviews.text: The directions have a water-to-beads ratio that results in too much water. I drained out the extra 12 hours later but the beads seem oversaturated and/or too delicate - when the kids play with them, they keep cracking and breaking
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer I Cooper

customer_reviews.title: These beads are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I opened my mailbox and thought "I've been ripped off." A small plastic bag contained what looked like a few teaspoons of micro-fine colored grains. Nonetheless I followed the instructions and soaked them in water overnight. Voila! The next morning I found my bucket filled to the brim with soft, mostly translucent, marble-sized beads. I used them to fill glass votive holders and placed a candle on top for a party. Very pretty with the candle lit. I can see how these would be wonderful as a sensory experience. Running my hands through the silky beads was very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: roseann8628

customer_reviews.title: Good value since you can dehydrate and rehydrate as needed!
customer_reviews.text: These beads are a great value. They come in super small packages and look really tiny, but they grow quickly into marble-sized jelly beads that are durable. It's possible for kids to break them apart, but it's not easy. My nieces and nephews were crazy for them, and continue to play with them. I emailed the company directly with a question about how long they last when hydrated, and I got a personal response within 20 minutes. What great customer service. You can let them dehydrate and rehydrate them later to avoid concern about growing bacteria. Will definitely purchase again for the kids in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: True to Description - definitely keep size of large pearl or bead
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the "Water Beads Ocean Tactile Sensory Experience - 4 Colors Sensory Beads Water Sensory Bags- 8,000ct" using Prime so they arrived within 2 days. I purchased them to use as the "soil" for my office succulents - jury is still out on whether this works for succulents as I found conflicting reports on whether succulents are "water" plants. As in other reviews, I do not recommend making them too big as they become very brittle but keeping them at the size of a large pearl/bead they are pretty durable. Overall I would recommend this product as it is true to color etc.
customer_reviews.author: MerTech

customer_reviews.title: Super sensory fun for the kiddo!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 21 months. I writes this long because she’s mostly over putting everything in her mouth. I soaked 1.5 Tb of beads (slightly less than a third of the package) in about a gallon and a half of water. I stirred it every 30 min or so and they plumped up in about 2 hours. There was extra water to drain off, but that’s ok. I didn’t find that the beads broke easily as other reviewers mentioned, but maybe it’s because I didn’t soak them as long. I put some plastic fish in there and my daughter had a blast finding the fish and scooping the beds with a measuring cup. Definitely a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This little bag of beeds seeds made about four gallons of water beeds. While they start to grow instantly, it took them about 4 hours to reach their full potential. They are now, on average, a bit bigger than the size of a marble.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fun decoration
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to make our wedding centerpieces - unfortunately our wedding was derailed by the covid 19, but the centerpieces we made turned out great. We bought small glass bowls from the dollar store, filled it with 20 of these balls, and placed an electronic candle in it. If you put submerge the candle in these balls, it produces a cool color from light deflection off them. These will also stay enlarged for up to one week if submerged in water overnight for one night.
customer_reviews.author: Meena

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves sensory objects so I decided to give these a try. Very easy to grow them, just add water and let them sit overnight. Package says 24 hours but they reach full size in about 7-8 hours. A little goes a long way!! We now have an entire mixing bowl full of these fun little beads.
customer_reviews.author: Asia F.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to use as a filler for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as a filler for a centerpiece. I needed enough for 20 center pieces. 8000ct should have been plenty. I don't have enough. No way is this 8000ct. Contacted company and they said it is weighed, not counted. Now I need.to find more beads to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kanekidz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but crumbled & fell apart
customer_reviews.text: My kids love water beads & we’ve purchased many different brands. I love the color of these, I originally purchased them to use as a, “Frog Habitat” sensory project. They absorbed the water & grew quickly, however once the kids started playing with them I noticed they fell apart & crumbled very easily. I ended up throwing them away after 1 use instead of storing them. For the price & quality I would have expected there to be more in the bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joey M.

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Well, at first seemed like these beads were going to be more sturdy, but the kids playing with them made them disintegrate suck that 122 the pool it was in was littered with bead bits. Wish I had a photo before they dumped it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Great Stuff

customer_reviews.title: the kids (and even adults) loved it! The beads feel so cool
customer_reviews.text: Made a Moana themed scavenger hunt in the beads with Moana figurines and other ocean animals, the kids (and even adults) loved it! The beads feel so cool. Playing with them is addicting. After a while (about 36 hours) they get a lot more fragile and were easy to squish into tiny pieces. It made a bit of a mess, but easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are just ok
customer_reviews.text: bought these for sensory play for toddlers. The info says they don’t break apart. Well, yes, you can put them in your fingers and squish them, or squish them on the floor with feet. I wrote to the company asking what they are made of, if they are safe if ingested by toddlers,, never got a response. (Thanks). So, I would not use these for younger kids, only in my flower vases.
customer_reviews.author: Blitz

customer_reviews.title: My daughter enjoyed them
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make an ocean themed sensory bin for my 2 year old. As others have stated, I found that the amount of water needed was too much. I emptied a lot of excess water. I also found these beads fall apart easily,although, this is our first time using so I'm not sure if that's typical for water beads. Other than that you do get a lot for the money and my daughter absolutely loved the activity and we have plenty of extra left over to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Welp

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and fun but break easily
customer_reviews.text: They look great. They look awesome and I love the mix of colors which was perfect for ocean/water activities. I used them for sensory activities with children with autism and they absolutely loved them. The only issue is that they are not very strong. I had several children that loved to just pop them apart and they were very easy to break. I know that is mostly due to them being safe if ingested but that is just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Bearb

customer_reviews.title: Lovely colors and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: First time using these and they were a lot easier to deal with than expected. Based on other reviews I decided to use less water than recommended which turned out fine. One teaspoon to four cups of water. There was still much water left once they fully expanded but I'll continue experimenting. Planning on using these for my sisters mermaid themed baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: LizG

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensory and entertainment
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved playing with these beads. We mixed them in water and watched them grow. The package says 24 hrs but surprisingly it went a lot faster then that. She went and checked the progress of her bead growth often. Once they were fully grown, she played with them for a couple of hours before dinner time. They are great for sensory and we didn’t have to use the whole bag all at once, leaving her with more to grow later.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: my kids are no stranger to playing with water beads, I put these in a huge tub of water before bed, and they hardly got bigger by 6pm the next afternoon, so almost 24 hours. Even 2 days later, they are still small. Disappointed. we've used other brands get around marble sized, these only got to be about pea sized
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: This bag does NOT make alot of beads & they break easily like other brands, not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This bag does NOT make alot of beads & they break easily like other brands, not as advertised! The company claims full refund if not satisfied but there's no way for me to contact them on Amazon. I only bought the beads since they said they are tougher than other brands. Not true, they break easily & are overpriced compared to many other water beads on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sensory experience for Pre-K students
customer_reviews.text: My wife who is a Pre-K teacher asked me to purchase this item as one of several sensory aids she planned to use in the classroom. After an overnight soak they were perfect for her project providing these young students with a unique sensory experience. The assortment of colors seemed to heighten their interest in these beads. Were there 8,000? Who could tell, but there seemed to be enough to go around.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: same picture but different product. smaller beads than picture shows
customer_reviews.text: I order two of them and I liked it. so I purchased again with same picture, thought same product. but it wasnot. beads were only half size I had(witch was on the picture). I would normally return them, but I am just keeping it only because I don't wanna take a trip in covid virus.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lew

customer_reviews.title: Slimy Sea Beads
customer_reviews.text: While the colors were vibrant and perfect for our Pout Pout Fish Book Week sensory table, the instructions and ratio of water to beads were incorrect. The beads quickly became slimy, whereas I have had good quality beads in the past that never became slimy. I didn't feel comfortable with my son continuing to play with them after 2 hours due to the slimy sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Kasela

customer_reviews.title: 10 minutes of fun and then days of a mess
customer_reviews.text: They were fun for the first 10 minutes. Then my children discovered they are so much fun to throw against the deck to watch them explode. And then at each other. This was fine until I realized that it will not get off our deck. I would think I got it all cleaned up and then the gel mess reappears the next rainy day. It also made my deck super slippery. It would have been better played with in the grass. Also, I wish they were more durable since they easily pop when pressed.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Batton

customer_reviews.title: Have to add water
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for beads that were already filled and the size that was pictured. These you had to add water and wait 24 hours. They start as little beads (about the size of a pin head) and never got bigger than a nail head. Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't freeze your water beads!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the beads and was surprised with how well they bloomed. The colors were great. My biggest problem was I froze some to make icebergs. I'm not sure what happened. They fell apart and I had to throw away half of the beads. Not sure if the freezing was the problem. I had some very sad 4 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Emily macina

customer_reviews.title: Sensory beads
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved these. She was entertained for almost 3 hours then continued to go back and play with them. Only thing I didn’t care for was how easy the come apart. She figured out if you squeeze them they break apart. Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Lara

customer_reviews.title: Not 8,000 water beads!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping as always. Definitely not 8,000 in package. I could not return because they are part of an under the sea unit in summer camp this week...no time to return/order from elsewhere. Totally disappointed with the quantity, quality seems to be okay.
customer_reviews.author: MrsO247

customer_reviews.title: These water beads are pretty cool and educational
customer_reviews.text: These water beads are pretty cool and educational. Everyone saw how the beads came in ( they were tiny) once we put a few in water and kept an eye on how they grew it was absolutely amazing. We have done several projects with them already and are always looking for more ideas. There are instructions on the package on how to get them to work. Although the package needs instructions on what to do with when you are done using them or how to dispose of the beads. If you contact customer service with any questions via an email you can guarantee a response quickly they are very helpful. These water beads are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: I am hooked
customer_reviews.text: Played with these all weekend. Using them to fill vases for center pieces. Inserted LED lights making it way cool. Colors are not very vibrant. Try adding some food coloring to get the intensity and color desired. Don't try to re-use them once they have been hydrated, as it takes forever for them to dry up to original state.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my classroom sensory table. I thought they would be perfect for our theme this month of Under the Sea! I soaked them for 24hrs as directed on the package and they looked great! But as soon as they were handled more they began to fall apart and break in half to small pieces! I am not sure if they absorbed too much water as I have read on other brands that they can fall apart if they get too much water, but like I said I followed the package directions of a 24hr soak.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I had submitted a previous review and can't find it, but wanted to edit that review. There are definitely at least eight thousand little beads in that package. Once you add water they expand, do not smell like some people have said, and the color actually looks like the picture. The packaging makes it appear there are less and at the beads are darker than they actually are. My daughter is very happy with the beads.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: I loved these!!
customer_reviews.text: These were great value for what I paid for them. I used them as decoration for a mermaid party and not only did they look amazing during the party, but I provided containers so that each guest could take some home at the end. There were soooo many we still had a ton left.
customer_reviews.author: Jbird

customer_reviews.title: Water bead size not as thought
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the size. They were much smaller than I anticipated even with pictures on Amazon but loved the colors, and the amount of the water beads for my ocean sensory tub. I bought these for first time online but others have gotten bigger in size than these. I have several colors already and have used water beads for many sensory tub activities for kids and love them but overall not happy with actual size of them.
customer_reviews.author: Silverfox

customer_reviews.title: These are great!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!!! You do not need nearly as much water as it says (1tbs beads and 1 gallon water), but we dumped out the excess water and love them!! I will just do less water next time. And we have plenty of beads left to do this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty colors and not much of a sticky feeling when playing. Doesnt take too long for beads to get big either. My son had quite a few that squashed and left nasty stuff in the table but overall I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: ... at a school for 7th-12th graders and my students love these beads
customer_reviews.text: I'm a counselor at a school for 7th-12th graders and my students love these beads! They are calming and fun to play with. So they are not just for little kids! They are beautiful colors! Don't the their small size fool you when you receive them. Follow the directions and you won't be disappointed! they look just like the picture. The only compliant I've received from my students is they smell weird.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hughey

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Creative Fun
customer_reviews.text: My three year old grandson is having a lot of fun with these. I bought small plastic aquatic animals also to create a sensory bin. The only bad thing is him poking the balls with the toys. Lol! Oh well. He’s three.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Quinn

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: They plumped up nicely (and quickly!). I noticed that they did not need as much water as was stated and didn't take as long to be ready to go. Some got bigger than others and I'm not sure why - maybe they were more submerged in the bowl of water. The kids enjoyed watching them grow and are loving playing with them in our science discovery table! The colors are beautiful ... I have only made 2 batches so far and have lots left in the bag - but I would totally buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Water Beads
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit confused at first when I received this product. The product came in a small bag with tiny beads. I was about to return it but decided to read others' reviews. After reading a few reviews, I learned that these beads have to be put in water for a while so they can expand. After doing this, my water beads expanded and look amazing. I will be using these for sensory activities with kids I work with. I recommend this product to anyone looking for materials for sensory activities for young kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa G Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Ehh. These are definitely worth the money compared to spending more on less at the other stores. But I do find the picture misleading. These don’t get that big in size.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: These water beads were perfect for a sensory bin “fishing pond.” The kids loved the activity! I used two packets for this beverage bin. I only used half of the recommended amount of water and they still remained wet. After about 24 hours they remained durable-did t use after that amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Killette

customer_reviews.title: picture does not match product received
customer_reviews.text: The beads are super small. They have to soak in water and grow to look like the picture. I do not know how well they will work with my project at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Maher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son has a tactile sensory issue and water beads were recommended from his OT. I was shocked that my son had no problem playing with them. Awesome value, lots and lots of beads. After a couple days some of the beads starting breaking down, so that was a bummer, but there are lots in the package.
customer_reviews.author: JJHBFamilyof3

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensory bins!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is really small and has no way of being resealed so I had to transfer it to a ziploc. You can find a bottle of them for the same price from other sellers but I really wanted the “ocean” colors. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: All the kids at my daughter’s mermaid themed party loved playing with these water beads. I added water to the beads four hours before the party started and they were the perfect size. I suggest not soaking the beads overnight because the beads will start to disintegrate. The colors were beautiful and the beads lasted for about 10 hours before they started to get mushy.
customer_reviews.author: planetcutopia

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile!
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot of fun and you get a lot in one package. However, as my 3 year old was playing with them, I noticed they were breaking very easily. They are super annoying to pick up once broken and made a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie & Pam Leal

customer_reviews.title: I’m so disappointed in these waterbeads
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed in these waterbeads. My kids were so excited to play with them and they put their hands in and they fall apart! We were looking forward to using this for our sensory table but it looks like I’ll have to toss them. It’s not like I can return beads that have been expanded. My friends said their waterbeads don’t do this. Picture shows what happens to the beads after I put my hands in them... they literally crumble.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These worked great, did exactly what they were supposed to do, and lasted a long time, actually still going! The color is bright and fun for ocean animals I also ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: These water beads are beautiful and enormous
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. We added one whole packet to a water table that was filled with cool water. Added a bit of pool shock to keep the water cleaner for longer. Think we're on day 3 and they're great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The beads worked and they are the exact same vibrant color as in the photos. I was very satisfied with the quality of the product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The beads are beautiful, but they don't expand as much as the transparent ones. The white beads are too many and I had to separate them for my project.
customer_reviews.author: Elina

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun and entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 and 2 year old grand daughters totally love playing with these outside in their water table. It's fascinating how this expand 10 to 20 times their size, and then return to the original size when they dry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Pre-K loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my pre-k babies in my classroom and they absolutely LOVE them! Did not take as long to hydrate and plump up, but let them set for good measure. Only thing is that my kids “pop” them fairly easy but other than that they work great for a sensory table/ calming center.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Childress

customer_reviews.title: Love these beads !!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! We made a doll pool & ended up putting them on the trampoline for a fun time ! You get a lot of beads for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sensory beads. They were used as a teaching aid for one of our Vacation Bible School lessons. We used them to represent the ocean in combination with the sea animals. The children learned how “when you struggle, Jesus Rescues”. The beads were a favorite by the children as well as the adults. I will definitely be ordering different colors for other projects in the future. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lashawnda

customer_reviews.title: Fun Activity
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely loved the beads. I used them for N activity at an event for adults but then brought them home and kept them for the kids for about two weeks. The early teen and the elementary schooler both loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Loveday

customer_reviews.title: They can be reused!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get as big as I’d hoped, but I could’ve done something wrong. Still really pretty and served their purpose well. I like that they can be reused.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey E.

customer_reviews.title: 8 cups of water / 1Tbs
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that came on the packet calls for way too much water. I used 8 cups of water for a heaping 1 tablespoon of beads. Let it soak overnight. The beads turned out perfectly and are very durable without smashing under light pressure. Colors are vibrant and ocean-like. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: B. A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Colors not as shown
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for an ocean-themed sensory bin based on the pretty colors in the product description photo. The colors I received are much darker. While they are somewhat ocean-like, they are not what was shown and I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Keen211

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and these ones get huge! Love the ocean colors too. Definitely buying more to put in our water table.
customer_reviews.author: D-Rock

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Crumbly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ocean colors. However, the beads started dissolving and breathing apart while the kids were playing with them
customer_reviews.author: Anchernyce Rich

customer_reviews.title: Sensory
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery. Love the calming colors. I use these for supervised sensory fun with a child diagnosed with ASD.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are just fun, especially for elementary children. Soft, squishy, and just fun to play with. Gave out 20 “beads” as prizes to each student. They absolutely loved them. The amount of expansion is unbelievable. 8000 pieces go a LONG way!
customer_reviews.author: Wobo

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and engaging!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my summer school classroom as we explore the ocean. The colors are perfect and my students love sorting and making patterns with the water beads. My students love the feeling of the beads and we also tracked the progress of the beads once they were in water to they were full sized. Aside from a couple of students trying to squish the beads flat they have been enjoyed in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Barton

customer_reviews.title: So cool and fun!!  Kids loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Beach Party Night for a kids club (25 kids) - ages 3-5 - they really enjoyed - they were awesome and I hated throwing them out after the party was over, but did not know what to do with four small tubs of them!
customer_reviews.author: S Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Small bag, not worth.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is good, the only thing I hate about this is. The value of this item is not worth is. 7 bucks for a small bag. I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: beastly_kata

customer_reviews.title: Cool colors, but please revise the instructions
customer_reviews.text: I loved the colors of these beads but the instructions made the beads way too saturated and they didn't last more than a few hours before they disintegrated into mush. I had bought them to use as a sensory activity for my toddlers, but they were not into the icky sensation of the mush. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nelysha

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown in the ad!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this little package makes a lot of beads! We had well over 30 cups of them and they were the perfect size and color for our birthday party project. They also grew a lot faster than the package suggests, which was good as this mama forgot to start them on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa Roos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent senosory purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my sons first birthday- fish themed. They were awesome! I was very surprised how quickly they grew in size. There are only half in the fish bowl. Kids loved putting their hands in the fish bowl. I will be purchasing more for future activities!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Don't squeeze them, they will turn into a mess.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for an "under the sea" birthday party. The kids all loved them. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because there were no instructions given. I had to go online to their website to figure out how to expand them. Great product though!
customer_reviews.author: Bonesaw2002

customer_reviews.title: Not 8000 beads!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used this yet but already can tell they’re not as many as advertised claim to be 8000 beads
customer_reviews.author: the_little_la

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Our first time buying water beads and my daughters, who are 6 and 9, played with them for a few hours a day. I stored them in a large plastic container with a snap-on lid so they could easily play and then store them for later. We have not tried to dry them out yet for re-use. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: They are great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my Granddaughter's bubble guppies 2nd bday party, they will be a perfect goodie bag favor and table decor item.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Tiny package, BIG FUN!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this activity. The packet it comes in is tiny but they expand to fill up a 28 Quart tub perfectly for a sensory play time! Gorgeous color for an ocean theme.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Cook

customer_reviews.title: Love these beads
customer_reviews.text: These are very fun. I bought them to use instead of pebbles in the centerpieces for a kids party to look like water. I would recommend soaking a full 24 hours though to get max size.
customer_reviews.author: Catie M

customer_reviews.title: Great therapeutic sensory tool!
customer_reviews.text: I am a therapist and these water beads are a great sensory tool and are wonderful to fidget with. Love the ocean color scheme, too--calming and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: B Brinton

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clear instructions. This package makes a huge batch of water beads. I only used half the bag and got a large batch of water beads for use with plenty left over.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: They don't grow big enough
customer_reviews.text: These did not grow! I bought them for an activity for my son's birthday party, but after leaving in water for over two whole days they are still smaller than a pea. Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Pelesan

customer_reviews.title: Beads break easily
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors. Was excited to use with sea creatures but these water beads break apart very easily so pieces all over your hands and in the bin. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cheri & Peter Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: These were horrible. I bought them for 3 and 4 year old to play with and they all started bursting and falling apart. It left a big slimy mess. After 1 hour of playing with them they had to be thrown away. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: W.A

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: In a lot smaller package then I thought. Also the directions call for way to much water. My son loves them though. Perfect for outside play on a warm day. They do break really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tawni A

customer_reviews.title: Easy, beautiful colors, and kids loved these!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great product and easy to figure out as a first time user. There weren’t any instructions in the packaging or on their website, but I have a cousin who helped with a ratio of beads to water. The kids loved them at the birthday party! I threw in some of the toys that grow when they’re in water from the dollar store, along with some little toy nets, and the kids enjoyed scooping the sea animal toys out!
customer_reviews.author: Malia Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with these ocean color water beads. My grandsons had a great birthday party playing in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensory favorite
customer_reviews.text: Students love these! Great for sensory needs and hiding items like letters or small animal toys to identify. They are short lived because despite rinsing they smell after a few days. Also, they can be pinched hard enough to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my grandkids and they love them! We have been having a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandkids and they love them! We have been having a lot of fun with them. I also love them and the colors are so soothing. My two year old granddaughter does like to squish them tho. That can be somewhat messy but messes are part of being a kid :) Overall I am very pleased and would recommend these for everyone. A great sensory experience and very pleasant customer service
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These sensory beads were great. There were a ton, so don’t use the whole package at one time. My kids loved playing with them. They took forever to dry out though.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 7 year old grandson. He loves sharks and other deep-sea creatures. I put these water beads in a big bin with lots of little sharks, etc, and a Lego submarine and divers. He LOVES it!! And I think these beads are fun, too!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Diane Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Beads for Foot spa
customer_reviews.text: These beads were bought for the foot spa. These are her favorite color and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Craft

customer_reviews.title: Bad Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Says to add 1 gal of water for every tbsp. This is clearly tooo much water. They’re fine after you figure out how to balance out the faulty math.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Oddsen

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: Love it. They grow very big and the colors just as pictured. I used them in mason jars for my sons Baptism as centerpiece
customer_reviews.author: Maria Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensory play
customer_reviews.text: The water beads are perfect for sensory play. We used them for a four-year-old’s birthday party, placing them in an empty water table with sea animal figurines. The kids loved them, they filled quickly, and the package arrived earlier than expected. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lbwr

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them,,,,,,!!!!!!! Beautiful no smell you get so many in the package!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Shan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: These beads, while beautiful, broke easily. You also don't need nearly as much water as the instructions tell you.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: My special needs kids are gonna love ❤️ this!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding? Yep that is what you are goning yo say to yourself just like I did! These tiny little growing miracle balls are gonna wow the special needs kids I work with! The love playing and water and these sensory balls will have them giggling! Awesome product and so inexpensive! Thank you ... Mr DJ the owner’
customer_reviews.author: AHarris

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: If you need lots of beads for decoration this product does the job, easy to use and no need to store as you would with heavy glass beads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sensory product for children!
customer_reviews.text: These water beads are amazing! After 24 hours they are full size and the children love playing with them! Put them in a large enough container so the children can spread out and have fun playing with sea animals in the beads and water!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: These beads are a multi purpose purchase so many uses and the kids love to watch them grow and grow when placed in water and so squishy
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy: They Disintegrate!
customer_reviews.text: These were a waste of money. They don't stand up to my gentle grown-up handling, so haven't got a chance against my 3.5 year old. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Amy J Roberts

product_meta.title: Sensory Jungle Beads Aqua Water Beads - 4 Colors Sensory Beads Water Sensory Bags- 8,000ct
feature_bullets: WHY YOU NEED IT: Our water beads encourage sensory exploration by creating a soothing tactile experience. They promote developmental learning by helping kids with color recognition, counting and fine motor skills and language development. Parents, teachers, and therapists love these sensory table toys for home & clinical use. Sensory Jungle water beads are 100% nontoxic, safe for toddlers & kids age 3+ and an excellent alternative to Orbeez!

WHO"S IT FOR: f you have a child, know a child, or work with a child who is special needs, autistic, or has sensory processing disorder then these therapy toys for kids are for you! Water beads for kids have been clinically tested to provide the sensory input that special needs kids desire. They are idea for children with sensory processing disorder and as autistic toys for toddlers.
WHAT'S IN IT: Made of super absorbent polymer sodium polyacrylate, our water beads for kids arrive as hard, tiny marbles (8,000 + in each package). Just add water!

HOW IT WORKS: Simply place the water beads in an absorbing jar of distilled water overnight and these beads will ‘magically’ grow to 1,000x their original size! Our beads won’t break or burst like other brands, because we test them thoroughly as special education toys.

OUR PROMISE TO YOU: We know you and your kids or students will LOVE these water beads, but if you’re not positively thrilled, let us know and receive a fast, no hassle refund. Our own kids have approved these beads, and we will only sell you our own kid approved products!
